metadata.title: CVE-2017-5838 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The gst_date_time_new_from_iso8601_string function in gst/gstdatetime.c inGStreamer before 1.10.3 allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (out-of-bounds heap read) via a malformed datetime string.

criterions.comment: gstreamer0.10: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
gstreamer1.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
